headline: Salesforce AI Deals Test Investor Patience As Valuation Screens Attractive
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) is expanding its AI footprint through the acquisition of Momentum to strengthen conversational and unstructured data ingestion for Agentforce and Slackbot. The company is partnering with GoDaddy to support identity verification for AI agents and with REI Systems to support governance around AI driven document analysis. Salesforce is also deepening its work with Asymbl to coordinate hybrid teams of human employees and AI agents across workflows. These moves come as...
